load("output/seDiann.RData")
diagOrd <- colData(seDiann) %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "smpID") %>% 
  group_by(diag) %>%
  summarise(n = length(smpID)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  pull(diag)
smpAnno <- colData(seDiann) %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "smpID") %>% 
  mutate(diag = factor(diag, levels = diagOrd))
smpAnno <- smpAnno[order(match(smpAnno$diag, diagOrd)), ]
smpAnno$ID <- factor(smpAnno$ID, levels = smpAnno$ID)

preData <- assays(seDiann)$log2 %>% as_tibble(rownames = "protID") %>%
  pivot_longer(-protID, names_to = "smpID", values_to = "count") %>%
  filter(!is.na(count)) %>%
  left_join(smpAnno)

title: Diann_QC
text:
missing rate

missTab <- assay(seDiann) %>% as.data.frame() %>%
  mutate(sampleNr = rowSums(!is.na(.)), 
         missRate = rowSums(is.na(.))/ncol(.))

missPropTab <- missTab  %>%
  group_by(missRate, sampleNr) %>%
  summarise(protNr = length(missRate), 
            proportion = protNr/nrow(.)) %>% ungroup()

plot_frequency(seDiann) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, size = 7)) + 
  scale_x_discrete(breaks = seq(-0, 399, 10))



  # + expand_limits(x = c(-2, ncol(wideData) + 2), y = 0)

missPropTab %>% ggplot(aes(x = missRate, y = proportion)) + geom_line(linewidth = 0.7, color = "green") +
  theme(axis.title.y.right = element_text(color = "green"))+ 
  labs(x = "Missing rate (%)") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  labs(title = "Protein missing rate")

text:
upset plot

presTab <- assay(seDiann) %>% as_tibble(rownames = "protID") %>%
  pivot_longer(-protID, names_to = "smpID", values_to = "count") %>%
  left_join(patTab, by = c("smpID" = "smpID")) %>%
  group_by(diagSimple, protID) %>%
  summarise(presence = ifelse(sum(is.na(count)) == 0 , 1, 0)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = diagSimple, values_from = presence) %>%
  column_to_rownames("protID")

      sets = setVars,

        main.bar.color = "violetred4",
        sets.bar.color = "turquoise4",
        matrix.color = "slateblue4",

# wrong annotation
smpDF[smpDF$sampleID == "SID2287", ]$diag <- "SMZL" 
smpDF[smpDF$sampleID == "SID2503", ]$diag <- "Unclear indolent B-cell lymphoma"

# change the names
smpDF$diag <- stringi::stri_replace_all_regex(smpDF$diag, 
                       pattern = c(" \\+ ", ", ", " \\(", "\\) ", "\\)", "\\?", "/"),
                       replacement = c(rep("_", 3), rep("", 3), "_or_"),
                       vectorize = FALSE) %>%
  str_replace("\\+", "_") %>%
  str_replace_all(" ", "_")
smpDF[grep("healty", smpDF$diag), ]$diag <- "healthy"

# make unique ID
smpDF <- unite(smpDF, ID, c(diag, smpID), remove = FALSE) %>% 
  make_unique("patID", "ID") %>%
  column_to_rownames("smpID")

# investigate diagnosis and patients
diagTab <- smpDF %>% group_by(diag) %>%
  summarise(Count = length(diag)) %>% arrange(desc(Count))
diagTab$condition <- factor(diagTab$diag, levels = diagTab$diag)
ggplot(diagTab, aes(x = condition, y = Count, fill = condition)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  geom_text(aes(label = Count), position = position_dodge(width = 0.9), vjust = -0.25) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom", 
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 20),
        axis.title.x = element_blank()) 



setTab <- smpDF %>% group_by(set) %>%
  summarise(Count = length(set)) %>% arrange(desc(Count))
setTab$Project <- factor(setTab$set, levels = setTab$set)
ggplot(setTab, aes(x = Project, y = Count, fill = Project)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  geom_text(aes(label = Count), position = position_dodge(width = 0.9), vjust = -0.25) +
  theme_bw() +

  sapply(colnames(pcRes$x), function(pc){

Generalized Linear Model
remove â€œS454563â€ that perhaps is a mis-annotation sample

# run lm 
set.seed(1374)
repetition <- 100
system.time({resMat <- lapply(seq_len(repetition), function(n){
    smpIdx <- c(sample(order(match(y, 1))[1:sum(y)], sum(!y), replace = TRUE), order(match(y, 1))[(sum(y)+1):length(y)])
    X <- cll2hcl.mat[smpIdx, ]
    cv.lasso <- cv.glmnet(x = X,
                          y = y[smpIdx], 
                          family = "binomial",
                          alpha = 1,
                          nfolds = sum(!y),
                          type.measure = "class")
    coef(cv.lasso, s = cv.lasso$lambda.min) %>% 
      as.matrix() %>%
      rbind("errors" = cv.lasso$cvm[cv.lasso$index["min", ]])
  }) %>% do.call(cbind, .)
})

Generalized Linear Model

y <- ifelse(colData(deList$cll2mcl)$diag == "CLL", 1, 0)
# run lm 
set.seed(849)
repetition <- 100
system.time({resMat <- lapply(seq_len(repetition), function(n){
    smpIdx <- c(sample(order(match(y, 1))[1:sum(y)], sum(!y), replace = TRUE), order(match(y, 1))[(sum(y)+1):length(y)])
    X <- cll2mcl.mat[smpIdx, ]
    cv.lasso <- cv.glmnet(x = X,
                          y = y[smpIdx], 
                          family = "binomial",
                          alpha = 1,
                          nfolds = sum(!y),
                          type.measure = "class")
    coef(cv.lasso, s = cv.lasso$lambda.min) %>% 
      as.matrix() %>%
      rbind("errors" = cv.lasso$cvm[cv.lasso$index["min", ]])
  }) %>% do.call(cbind, .)
})

   user  system elapsed 
 68.899   0.385  69.339 

colnames(resMat) <- seq_len(repetition)

errDiann <- as_tibble(resMat["errors", ], rownames = "repetition") %>%
  mutate(data = "cll2mcl") %>%
  rbind(errDiann, .)



Visualization

# error plot
as_tibble(rownames = "repetition", resMat["errors", ]) %>%
  mutate(repetition = factor(repetition, level = as.numeric(repetition))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = repetition, y = value, group = 1)) +
  geom_point(size = 1) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "The smallest errors inside CV along the repetition") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5), 
        axis.text.x = element_blank()) +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y~1, se = FALSE)



# coefficient is zero or not
coefMat <- resMat[-c(1, nrow(resMat)), ]
zeroProts <- rowSums(coefMat != 0) %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "protID") %>% 
  filter(value == 0) %>%
  pull(protID)
zeroMat <- ifelse(coefMat[-which(rownames(coefMat) %in% zeroProts), ] == 0, 0, 1)
pheatmap::pheatmap(zeroMat, 
                   treeheight_row = 0, treeheight_col = 0,
                   show_rownames = FALSE, show_colnames = FALSE,
                   color = c("lightgrey", "black"),
                   border_color = "lightgrey", 
                   legend_breaks = c(0, 1),
                   legend_labels = c("zero", "non-zero"),
                   legend = TRUE,
                   main = paste0("coefficients existance of ", nrow(zeroMat), " none-zero proteins among ", repetition, " repetition"))



# frequency plot
freqDF <- rowSums(coefMat != 0) %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "protID") %>% 
  filter(value != 0) %>%
  group_by(value) %>%
  summarise(count = length(value)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(frequency = factor(value/repetition * 100))
freqDF %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = frequency, y = count, fill = frequency)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_bw(base_line_size = 0) +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, size = 7, vjust = 0.5)) +
  labs(x = "proportion of non-zero coefficients (%)", y = "protein count", title = paste0("The  frequency of coefficients in ", repetition, " repetition")) +
  geom_text(aes(label = count), vjust = 0, size = 2.5)



cutoff <- freqDF %>% arrange(desc(value)) %>% 
  mutate(cum = cumsum(count), dif = cum - NR ) %>%
  filter(abs(dif) == min(abs(dif))) %>%
  pull(value)

# frequency vs mean plot
sumDF <- apply(coefMat, 1, function(v) c(mean = mean(v[v != 0]), sd = sd(v[v != 0]))) %>% 
  ifelse(is.nan(.) | is.na(.), 0, .) %>%
  t() %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "protID") %>%
  left_join(as_tibble(rownames = "protID", rowSums(coefMat != 0) / repetition * 100))  %>%
  setNames(c("protID", "mean", "sd", "frequency")) %>%
  mutate(coefficient = case_when(mean > 0 & frequency >= cutoff ~ "positive", 
                                 mean == 0 | frequency < cutoff ~ "not selected",
                                 mean < 0 & frequency >= cutoff ~ "negative"),
         delabel = ifelse(coefficient == "not selected", NA, protID))  %>%
  arrange(mean)

Joining with `by = join_by(protID)`

sumDF %>% ggplot(aes(x = mean, y = frequency, col = coefficient)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("dodgerblue3", "gray50", "firebrick3")) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = cutoff, lty = 4, col = "black", lwd = 0.8) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty = 4, col = "black", lwd = 0.8) +
  labs(y = "Frequency (%)") +
  geom_label(aes(label = delabel), size = 3) +
  theme_bw()

title: Trisomy12 and IGHV
text:
Trisomy12

NR <- 30
repetition <- 100
y <- patDF$trisomy12
resMat <- lapply(seq_len(repetition), function(n){
    smpIdx <- c(sample(order(match(y, 0))[1:sum(y == 0)], sum(y == 1), replace = TRUE), order(match(y, 0))[(sum(y == 0)+1):length(y)])
    X <- assay.fil[smpIdx, ]
    cv.lasso <- cv.glmnet(x = X,
                          y = y[smpIdx], 
                          family = "binomial",
                          alpha = 1,
                          nfolds = 3,
                          type.measure = "auc")
    coef(cv.lasso, s = cv.lasso$lambda.min) %>% 
      as.matrix() %>%
      rbind("errors" = cv.lasso$cvm[cv.lasso$index["min", ]])
  }) %>% do.call(cbind, .)
colnames(resMat) <- seq_len(repetition)
coefMat <- resMat[-c(1, nrow(resMat)), ]

cutoff <- rowSums(coefMat != 0) %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "protID") %>% 
  filter(value != 0) %>%
  group_by(value) %>%
  summarise(count = length(value)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(desc(value)) %>% 
  mutate(cum = cumsum(count), dif = cum - NR ) %>%
  filter(abs(dif) == min(abs(dif))) %>%
  pull(value)
# frequency vs mean plot
sumDF <- apply(coefMat, 1, function(v) c(mean = mean(v[v != 0]), sd = sd(v[v != 0]))) %>% 
  ifelse(is.nan(.) | is.na(.), 0, .) %>%
  t() %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "protID") %>%
  left_join(as_tibble(rownames = "protID", rowSums(coefMat != 0) / repetition * 100))  %>%
  setNames(c("protID", "mean", "sd", "frequency")) %>%
  left_join(geneDF) %>%
  mutate(coefficient = case_when(mean > 0 & frequency >= cutoff ~ "positive", 
                                 mean == 0 | frequency < cutoff ~ "not selected",
                                 mean < 0 & frequency >= cutoff ~ "negative"),
         delabel = ifelse(coefficient == "not selected", NA, hgnc_symbol))  %>%
  arrange(mean)

  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty = 4, col = "black", lwd = 0.8) +
